page.title: 10Old Whittington Industries
page.content: A new industrial estate is being built at Station Lane,Old Whittington. Companies recently opened include Autoglyed M.O.T. testing station which employs 3 men who repair & test cars; a curtain and cushion manufacturer employing thirty-two people both male and female; a rock drilling equipment manufacturer who employs forty-two people again both male and female and including two from the Government's Youth Training Scheme; Computer Automation Technology Ltd. who employ six people & write computer software. Altogether more than eighty people are employed on this new development and it is expected that this will gradually increase over the next few years.
